video_prompt: Pink hair flows and shifts, sparkles drifting. Golden tears slowly streak down, changing form and glinting. Background lighting subtly pulses and alters.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** A striking, highly detailed portrait of a woman with flowing pastel pink hair, chest up, looking upward and left. She wears a dark blindfold with intricate golden tear designs and dripping golden liquid. Her lips are vibrant red, and her fair skin catches warm, ambient light with red and golden sparkles. She wears a dark, shimmering high-necked garment. Blurred background of a warm-lit room with a golden-framed picture. Mysterious, ethereal, and artistic, emphasizing golden accents.
refined_video_prompt: Pink hair billows, its sparkles drifting. Golden tears slowly stream, their forms shimmering and changing. Background lighting subtly pulses and dynamically shifts.
